title: Japan's record $940 bln budget may help COVID-hit economy, fiscal discipline in doubt
content:
1. Japan's record $940 bln budget may help COVID-hit economy, fiscal discipline in doubt  Fox Business
  2. Japan Approves Major Hike in Military Spending, With Taiwan in Mind  The New York Times
  3. Japan's record $940 bln budget to help recovery as fiscal reform in back seat  Reuters
  4. Japan’s Kishida advances $940bn budget aimed at pandemic recovery  Al Jazeera English
  5. Japan to unveil record $943 billion budget to ensure post-Covid recovery, draft shows  CNBC

localize.title: 日本の9,400億ドルの予算は、COVIDで打撃を受けた経済を助けるかもしれないが、財政規律は疑問である。
日本创纪录的9400亿美元预算可能有助于受COVID影响的经济，财政纪律受到质疑
日本創紀錄的9400億美元預算可能有助於受COVID影響的經濟，財政紀律受到質疑
